Officer Tepios:
I will tell you about the area you will enter and what you must do there.
You will enter Hall of Erosion, which consists of a interconnected set of 8 rooms. There are Tumors of Death in 4 of those rooms. You must destroy those Tumors.
Once you have done so, Cohemenes will appear. Be quick! You have only 20 minutes to complete the mission. Do you understand?
